meanings.definition: A group of fungi that includes water molds and downy mildews.
meanings.sent1: The phycomycetes in the pond are causing the water to become murky.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study phycomycetes to understand their impact on plant health.
meanings.sent3: The phycomycetes at the party were the life of the gathering, always making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The spread of phycomycetes in the garden was like a slow invasion, taking over every corner.
meanings.sent5: The musty smell of phycomycetes filled the air, signaling their presence in the damp environment.
